pullRequest.title: Highlight 'Stick' in Werewolf Agility Course
pullRequest.bodyText:
Similar to highlighting 'Mark of Grace' when doing Rooftop Agility Courses, it would be helpful to highlight the 'Stick' when doing Werewolf Agility Course.
Closes #6474

nodes.bodyText: maybe should rename to stickHighlightColor to match the name and description?
Additionally, set your continuation indent to 4. Code Conventions
This will remove your stickTile if any item on any tile despawns, which i don't think is what you want.
You forgot to remove this when moving it to a separate method
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -125,18 +126,31 @@ public Dimension render(Graphics2D graphics)
 				if (markOfGraceTile.getPlane() == client.getPlane() && markOfGraceTile.getItemLayer() != null
 						&& markOfGraceTile.getLocalLocation().distanceTo(playerLocation) < MAX_DISTANCE)
 				{
